Items.Title: Application number C 220356 HAX (2017 Grand Concourse) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 2017 Grand Concourse (Block 2808, Lot 90), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 5, Council District 14.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application number C 220357 PQX (2017 Grand Concourse) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the acquisition of property located at 2017 Grand Concourse (Block 2808, Lot 90), to facilitate the development of a new nine-story affordable housing building containing approximately 33 affordable housing units, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 5, Council District 14.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application number C 220356 HAX (2017 Grand Concourse) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 2017 Grand Concourse (Block 2808, Lot 90), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 5, Council District 14.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.

Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
